sqlMap.update: update QY_ZZJG set qybz='Y' where JGBM=#jgbm#
update QY_ZZJG set qybz='N' where JGBM=#jgbm#
sqlMap.select: select max(jbdm) from QY_ZZJG where sj_jgbm =#sjJgbm#

select count(*) from QY_ZZJG where SJ_JGBM=#sjJgbm# and MC=#mc# and yxbz='Y'
JGBM <> #jgbm#

SELECT A.JGBM AS jgbm, A.MC AS mc, A.JC AS jc, A.DZ AS dz, A.DH AS dh, A.YB AS yb, A.FZR AS fzr, A.CJR_CZY_DJXH AS cjrCzyDjxh, A.CJRQ AS cjrq, A.XGR_CZY_DJXH AS xgrCzyDjxh, A.XGRQ AS xgrq, (SELECT RY.MC from QY_RYDJ RY WHERE RY.CZY_DJXH = A.CJR_CZY_DJXH) cjrMc, (SELECT RY.MC from QY_RYDJ RY WHERE RY.CZY_DJXH = A.XGR_CZY_DJXH) xgrMc FROM QY_ZZJG A where A.yxbz = 'Y' and A.JGLB_DM = '4'
A.sj_jgbm=#sjJgbm#
order by A.jgbm asc

SELECT A.JGBM AS jgbm, A.MC AS mc, A.JC AS jc, (SELECT B.JGLB_MC FROM dm_jglb B WHERE B.JGLB_DM=A.JGLB_DM) AS lbMc, (SELECT B.JC FROM QY_ZZJG B WHERE B.JGBM=A.SJ_JGBM) AS sjMc, A.DZ AS dz, A.DH AS dh, A.JBDM AS jbdm, A.YB AS yb, A.FZR AS fzr, A.QYBZ AS qybz, A.CJR_CZY_DJXH AS cjrCzyDjxh, A.CJRQ AS cjrq, A.XGR_CZY_DJXH AS xgrCzyDjxh, A.XGRQ AS xgrq, (SELECT RY.MC from QY_RYDJ RY WHERE RY.CZY_DJXH = A.CJR_CZY_DJXH) cjrMc, (SELECT RY.MC from QY_RYDJ RY WHERE RY.CZY_DJXH = A.XGR_CZY_DJXH) xgrMc FROM QY_ZZJG A where A.yxbz = 'Y' and A.JGLB_DM = '4'
A.sj_jgbm=#sj#
$orderStr$
